ygData.subject: Re: 16th level water song
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes the Giant can see u underwater.  I got kill underwater once trying to out run them. And yes, notice that too about the music.  Yesterday I was playing my
ygData.messageBody:
Yes the Giant can see u underwater. I got kill underwater once trying to
out run them.
And yes, notice that too about the music. Yesterday I was playing my lute
around the fish market and I hear music.

Your Friendly Rogue and Bard,
Hammerpaw and Samiam


-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 2:42 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] 16th level water song


From: John Kim <kim@...>

On Tue, 18 May 1999, Randy Varnell wrote:
>
> >I remember seeing a discussion going on about, where to purchase the
> >Water Breathing song , and its effect is obvious, but my question is,
> >is it useful ?
>
> Yes, very.
>
> >Are there any dungeons that are completely under water?
>
> Yes, plus many non-dungeon places to explore that are underwater.

On a related note, has anyone figured out if being underwater
also means being out of sight? e.g. if there's a giant by the
river, can you swim past him underwater? Or can they see
through water like they can through walls?

And has anyone else noticed they seem to have added more music
to the game? At first I thought it was new because I'd just
started using a wind instrument. But then I started hearing
the tune with my other instruments, and other tunes while I
was passing different buildings.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
